metadata.description: A UserGroup is a collection of User resources. In ElastiCache RBAC for Redis/Valkey, User objects (with specific command/key permissions) are grouped into UserGroups, which are then associated with ReplicationGroups. The UserGroup configuration inherits its access rules from all its member Users.

patch.description: The User provides its userID to be enrolled in the UserGroup.
The UserGroup holds an array of userIDs referencing member User resources.
